backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types for books, meditation sessions, journal entries, rituals, user profiles, and progress, plus initial book data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of key frontend files, summarizing their roles and recent UI/logic updates.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Instructions for redeploying the app, including prerequisites and standard build/deploy steps.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template for diagnosing deployment issues across install, backend, build, and runtime phases.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry with environment shims, global error handlers, and bootstrapping of the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all app routes and wraps the app in theme and error boundary providers.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Carousel component for selecting ambient audio tracks with swipe navigation, mute control, and volume-adjusted playback.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays diagnostic info with a reload option.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Error banner showing cloud sync issues with contextual messaging and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/DurationRangeInp: Slider-based input for selecting a duration value within a configurable minute range.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating vertical navigation menu with animated icons and hover labels for major app sections.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile sidebar menu providing theme toggle, account state handling, navigation, and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/JournalFiltersDr: Filter panel for journals offering mood, energy, date, text, and favorites filtering via dropdown controls.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Interactive pager that displays category pages with swipe, keyboard, and animated transitions, resetting on category change.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Carousel for selecting knowledge categories with circular navigation, keyboard and swipe support, and styled card positioning.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Quiz dialog that shuffles questions, tracks answers, shows progress and results, and supports retaking.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Three.js lotus flower model that animates petals, glow, and growth based on a LotusGrowthState.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Renders animated particle effects around the lotus, switching between chaotic and coherent modes based on growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas-based animated lotus with particles and theme‑dependent visual intensity.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Carousel for choosing meditation types with swipe, looping navigation, and scaled centered cards.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Interactive stepper with swipe, dot navigation, and content parsing for main text and benefits.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Canvas-based animated circular timer with wave effects and theme‑responsive colors.
frontend/src/components/MeditationWaveFi: Canvas fill indicator showing animated waves inside a circular clip, reflecting progress.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that optionally triggers a callback and navigates to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Wrapper providing page background and rendering a LotusCanvas behind children.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-rendered glowing bowl that fills with animated liquid based on total minutes.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: 3D React Three Fiber lotus visualization with lights, particles, and auto-rotation based on growth state.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: SVG lotus with animated breathing, glow, and multi-layer petals driven by growth state and streak.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Implements a multi-step quiz dialog that collects user answers and computes a recommended meditation type based on scoring logic.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Displays a modal listing up to five saved rituals and allows users to start or delete them.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Provides a swipeable carousel for browsing, starting, and deleting saved rituals with confirmation handling.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Shows login or guest status and provides logout or return-to-start actions with query cleanup.
Renders page navigation with theme toggle, back button, session indicator, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/ThemedToaster.ts: Wraps a themed toaster component enabling toast notifications with a close button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCloudOperation.ts: Provides a wrapper for cloud write operations with retry logic using the current actor and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication state and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: A customizable meditation timer hook supporting pause, reset, progress tracking, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend data such as books, quotes, profiles, journal entries, and guest-mode fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles using Tailwind, custom OKLCH themes, animations, and typography settings.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports static meditation book recommendations with metadata and Amazon links.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Defines interfaces for quiz questions and technique content and exports a data array of meditation techniques with pages and quizzes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Displays a swipeable carousel of book recommendations with theme handling and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with quotes, meditation selection, ritual management, and quiz routing.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Implements a full journal interface with filtering, editing, favoriting, and import/export of entries.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Shows meditation knowledge content with category selection, scrolling behavior, and quiz score tracking.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page that handles theme toggling, Internet Identity login, guest mode, and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Pre-meditation setup page with mood inputs, duration settings, ambient sound selection, detailed guides, and session start logic.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Progress dashboard showing stats, rank, streaks, and supports cloud import/export with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/ambientSounds.ts: Defines available ambient sounds and helper functions to fetch sound metadata and paths.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Maps backend/cloud-sync errors to user-friendly messages and classifies error types.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSyncRetry.ts: Provides retry logic for cloud operations with readiness and authorization checks.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Converts backend meditation data into a JSON-safe export format with bigint handling and includes validators for meditation, mood, and energy types.
Manages storing and retrieving user or guest knowledge quiz scores in localStorage with hooks for React.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Calculates lotus growth visualization parameters based on total meditation minutes using phased thresholds and smooth interpolation.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Provides guest-only localStorage management for journal entries, progress data, and rituals with legacy key migration.
frontend/src/utils/meditationType.ts: Validates and normalizes meditation type strings, including alias handling, defaulting to mindfulness.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers for progress based on total minutes and helpers to query current, next, and displayable rank info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, scanning project files, and extending theme with custom OKLCH color tokens, shadows, and radius settings.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing UI refinement tasks, feature requirements, and a known issue with the meditation time slider.
